hero.title: Tshiimiswa Tsha Vhulauli ha Zwithu zwa Shango
hero.subtitle: Bveledzani zwinwe zwi konaho kha nyambo dzothe dza 11 dza mulayo. Vho vhakhelwa nga Vhaafurika Tshipembe, kha Vhaafurika Tshipembe.

features.title: Zwo Vhakelwa Mzansi
features.subtitle: Purple Glow a yo ngo pindululwa fhedzi—i khou pfesesa mvelele. U bva kha luambo lwa doropo hu ya kha Afurikana ha maga zwa vhubindudzi.

aiEngine.title: Tshienjini tsha Zwinwe zwa AI
aiEngine.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 zwo ita uri zwiposo zwavho zwi vhe khwine. Bveledzani nyathiso, zwifanyiso na divhidhiyo zwi re khwine kha vhavhali vha SA.

multilingual.title: Nyambo 11, Pulatifomu Ithihi
multilingual.description: Rumelani nga Tshivenda nga matsheloni, Afurikana tshifhingani tsha masiari, Tshingisi matshelo. Shandukisani nyambo vhukati ha mutaladzi.

scheduling.title: U Dzhiela Pfunzo kwa Vhukoni
scheduling.description: AI i khou guda tshifhinga tsho teaho u rumela kha vhavhali vhawe. Dzhielani pfunzo zwinwe zwa nwedzi yothe kha minithi 10.

step1.title: Talani Vibe Yavho
step1.description: Vhudzisani Purple Glow uri ni khou rekisa mini na kana ni khou fulufhedzisa mini. Nangulani thoni yavho: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, kana Cyberpunk.

step2.title: AI i Bveledza Zwinwe
step2.description: Tshienjini tshashu tsho fhiwa maanda nga Gemini tsho bveledza zwiposo zwo dzhielwa pfunzo ya pulatifomu na zwifanyiso nga sekhondi.

step3.title: Dzhielani Pfunzo & Rumelani
step3.description: Sedani, lulamelelani kana dzhielani pfunzo. Purple Glow i khou shuma zwine zwa sala—nahone i khou themendela tshifhinga tsho teaho u rumela.
